description: View trending repositories built by developers on Github using Vue3's Composition API.
This project contains a demo of the landing page and admin CMS dashboard for Zoomba, a motion tracking desktop game.
•A mobile application that finds the nearest car park from your current location and displays the number of available lots for that car park.
A project to build a robot that navigates a maze. This repository contains the algorithm implementation for the robot.
An automated web scrapper that scrapes the Co-Curricular Activities (CCA) from Ngee Ann Polytechnic’s website
A Telegram bot service that allows users to manage and spend retail and restaurant vouchers earned by playing games and doing tasks.
A website that recommends food places base on user's preference and their location.
A dart/flutter plugin to manage device's sound mode
